    • getCommand

      public static String getCommand(Predicate integerPredicate, List<String> textCommands, List<String> intCommands, String errorMessage) throws IOException
      Method to get a command from client
      Parameters:
      integerPredicate - the predicate that checks the range of integer commands
      textCommands - list of available text commands
      intCommands - list of the available commands of the list
      errorMessage - message to be printed in case the client insert a wrong command
      Returns:
      the string corresponding to the command chosen
      Throws:
      IOException
